attributes.action: provide a platform and encourage to investigate, the allegations of so called Armenian genocide.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the hurtful unveiling of a so called Armenian genocide memorial in Cardiff, without proper consultation and investigation of both sides of the story, I beleive it to be necessary to urge PM to create a platfrom which is going to investigate these allegations, rather than relying on information provided by lobbies that may have political agendas. This should be done by thorough investigations by historians, especially Turkish and Armenian historians into the time frame of the allegations, so we can find out the truth about what really happened, before another so called genocide monument is erected witout the backing of truth and facts, but the political influence of the rich and powerful Armenian lobby.
